channel.title: enable network.IDN_show_punycode by default in Thunderbird to fix URL not showing real Domain Name - Homograph attack (Punycode)
channel.description:
https://forums.whonix.org/t/very-hard-to-notice-phishing-scam-firefox-tor-browser-url-not-showing-real-domain-name-homograph-attack-punycode/8373 also applies to Thunderbird.
Should we set `network.IDN_show_punycode` to `true` by default?
There should not be any fingerprinting issues since Thunderbird is not a browser.
